benchmark_details.name: CogEdit
benchmark_details.overview: CogEdit is a novel benchmark designed to evaluate MLLMsâ€™ meta-cognitive knowledge editing abilities across three levels: Counterfactual-Driven Editing, Boundary Constraint Editing, and Noise-Robust Editing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the meta-cognitive capabilities of multimodal knowledge editing.

data.source: Curated from various multimodal QA datasets, specifically 1,174 VQA questions spanning sports, arts, science, and everyday activities.
data.annotation: Manual data curation and validation processes were employed.

methods: Evaluation of editing success under various conditions
methodology.calculation: Each metric is calculated based on the model's ability to maintain accuracy and adapt to edits under specific scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in accurately maintaining knowledge and adapting to new inputs under various constraints.
